quotes.quote: With wealth comes responsibility.
True wealth is not of the pocket, but of the heart and of the mind.
All wealth is the product of labor.
To be wealthy and honored in an unjust society is a disgrace.
A man is rich in proportion to the number of things which he can afford to let alone.
Wealthy people have not disappeared, they are just not so willing to show off their wealth.
The wealth of a soul is measured by how much it can feel; its poverty by how little.
Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence.
There is only one true wealth in all the universeâ€“living time.
The first wealth is health.
There is no wealth but life.
Riches don't make a man rich, they only make him busier.
Wealth is not his that has it, but his that enjoys it.
Being rich is not about how much money you have or how many homes you own; it's the freedom to buy any book you want without looking at the price and wondering if you can afford it.
Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
The greatest wealth is to live content with little, for there is never want where the mind is satisfied.
Wealth, like happiness, is never attained when sought after directly. It comes as a by-product of providing a useful service.

Wealth does not necessarily mean having millions and millions of pesos. Being wealthy simply means having the financial resources to support your chosen lifestyle. Wealth is nothing more than having money to fund your particular needs at any given time.
If you would be wealthy, think of saving as well as getting.

Being wealthy isn't just a question of having lots of money. It's a question of what we want. Wealth isn't an absolute, it's relative to desire. Every time we seek something that we can't afford, we can be counted as poor, how much money we may actually have.
Wealth can only be accumulated by the earnings of industry and the savings of frugality.
Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.
The only question with wealth is, what do you do with it?
The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
Wealth is not about having a lot of money; it's about having a lot of options.
It is great wealth to a soul to live frugally with a contented mind.
Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
Wealth is conspicuous, but poverty hides.
Wealth is well known to be a great comforter.
You aren't wealthy until you have something money can't buy.
